oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Monitoring and management of energy and emissions in agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Little, Tony
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Recycling, balancing and resource management
Air and water emissions
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This review collates the results of research into energy use and emissions in organic farming, and provides advisers with an analysis of the results, access to the data used and a review of the benchmarking methodologies available. The review will inform those working in the development of benchmarking tools and advising farmers on practices to improve their performance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Little, Tony (2007) Monitoring and management of energy and emissions in agriculture. Institute of Organic Training and Advice, Craven Arms, Shropshire, UK.
